function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Monopolistic introduction of unique iot devices by corporations","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"High implementation costs leading to abandonment or refocusing of the smart city pursuit","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reliance on skewed data for decision-making","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Dependency on quality network for smart city sustainability","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Introduction of 6g technology","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Disruption of wireless technology installation and application due to covid-19","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Major shift to at-home work and self-isolated society in developed countries","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased domestic internet use leading to potential spread of contagious diseases through shared devices and networks","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Major decline in fixed office internet access leading to increased reliance on shared public wi-fi networks","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Implementation of 5g and potential future transition to 6g increasing connectivity and data transfer speeds","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential spread of contagious diseases through increased interaction between iot devices and humans","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Privacy concerns and resistance to iot-based data collection for healthcare monitoring","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased reliance on ai technology for health data analysis","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential spread of contagious diseases due to increased movement and interaction of people and wildlife as a result of optimized location awareness and autonomous transportation","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased reliance on telemedicine and remote healthcare services facilitated by 6g technology could result in potential cybersecurity vulnerabilities and data privacy risks","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Integration of intelligent wearable devices iwd and remote healthcare technologies powered by 6g may lead to challenges in ensuring the accuracy and reliability of health data collected from individuals","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Rapid spread of contagious diseases due to physical contact and use of paper-based identity systems","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inequitable access to digital services and technologies, exacerbating urban inequalities and infrastructure issues","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Dependence on traditional behavioral aspects and lack of adoption of contactless technologies leading to continued risk of disease transmission and reduced pandemic containment efforts","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Unprecedented interest and increase in wearable devices and smart body implants","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Massive availability and utilization of data in urban environments through 6g technology","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential spread of contagious diseases through urban areas due to rapid population growth and increased global connectivity","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential for the spread of contagious diseases in the built environment due to increased use of virtual reality technology","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of physical presence in real-time operations may lead to delayed or inadequate response to health and safety hazards","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Obsolete hardware and software in the past may have lacked proper infection control measures","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Remote operation and monitoring may lead to increased risk of contagion spread if proper health and safety measures are not implemented","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased urban density and the use of digital replicas in smart cities may impact public health and safety","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of accurate data on urban forest composition and health","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate modeling of project impacts","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Rapid adoption of 5g model without thorough impact assessment","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate policy and law formulation in urban planning due to lack of consideration for digital fluency and digital rich environments","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reliance on old-school drawing culture and impersonal autocad representations due to contemporary addiction to digital narrative rich television shows and movies","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential limitations in using 5g and 6g technologies for telemedicine, teleworking, and real-time communication in health sector","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased reliance on remote working and xr technology may lead to decreased social interaction and community cohesion, increasing the risk of mental health issues and social isolation","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"The use of xr technology and virtual environments could lead to decreased physical activity and an associated increase in sedentary behavior, leading to health issues","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased adoption of xr technology may lead to cybersecurity risks and potential exposure to virtual threats, impacting data privacy and security","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential spread of contagious diseases through increased physical interactions in urban areas and cities due to the use of xr technology","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential transmission of contagious diseases through shared holographic displays","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased risk of infection due to crowded spaces around holographic displays","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Risk of virus transmission through shared touch surfaces on holographic display interfaces","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of high fidelity mobile holographic capability may lead to increased physical interaction and close proximity among individuals, potentially facilitating the spread of contagious diseases","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Integration of ai and big data in creating super datasets for urban fabrics may lead to data privacy and security risks, potentially exposing sensitive information to unauthorized individuals or entities","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential spread of contagious diseases due to increased physical interaction in urban spaces and events","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate technological infrastructure for 6g and smart cities","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Remodelling and re-engineering of networks and systems across cities","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Creation of new types of devices leading to obsolescence of existing ones","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Challenges in achieving supportive infrastructures for 6g technology","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Cost implications and extensive upgrades for existing networks","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Shift towards less face-to-face human interactions due to the outbreak of covid-19","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Rapid shift to digital technology in architecture education","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"}]}
